title: Obama says gun ownership 'shouldn't be' a partisan issue

title: AI’s key role in cybersecurity and national security
description: While artificial intelligence (AI) is not new, Google Bard, Microsoft Bing, ChatGPT and similar products have made the technology accessible and understandable to the average consumer. title: Trump forced to cancel outdoor Iowa rally due to tornado warnings

title: Fed hikes and default fears: Here's what could be next for the housing market
description: Homebuyers and renters alike could feel relief later this year as home prices stabilize, mortgage rates decline and rent price growth continues to slow. title: Sunday shows preview: All eyes on the border post-Title 42; debt ceiling deadline looms
description: In the wake of Title 42’s expiration on Thursday, the situation at the U.S.-Mexico border will likely dominate the Sunday talk show circuit this weekend. The pandemic-era policy implemented under former President Trump, which allowed authorities to rapidly expel migrants without permitting them to seek asylum, was used more than 2.8 million times over the...

title: North Carolina governor vetoes 12-week abortion ban
description: North Carolina Gov. Roy Cooper (D) vetoed legislation on Saturday that would establish a 12-week abortion ban in the state, potentially setting up the legislature for a battle to override it and make the ban law. Cooper held a rally on Saturday with about 1,000 abortion-rights activists and voters in the capital city of Raleigh...

title: Why the GOP is going to war over military drag queens
description: The GOP backlash to a former Navy digital ambassador who performs as a drag queen highlights a growing focus for Republican lawmakers overseeing the military. Even before Joshua Kelley was hammered for making Instagram videos under the drag queen name Harpy Daniels, Republicans held hearings on diversity programs at the Pentagon and blasted drag shows...

title: Biden counting on two little-used technologies to fight climate change
description: The Biden administration this week proposed a new rule that could go a long way toward meeting the president's ambitious climate goals. But it relies on two little-used technologies, which could make its targets challenging to reach. The new proposal lays out strict limits for planet-warming emissions from coal plants and some gas plants that would significantly cut down...

title: DeSantis says GOP needs to reject ‘culture of losing’ to win in 2024

title: It’s time to rethink disability and work policy
description: By rethinking disability and work, the federal government could begin to support all of the diverse work patterns of individuals with severe health problems.

title: Confirm Bradley Garcia to the District of Columbia Circuit bench
description: Now that the U.S. Senate has reassembled, it must swiftly appoint President Biden’s exceptional nominee Bradley Garcia to the U.S. Court of Appeals for the D.C. Circuit. The court is the nation’s second most important tribunal, because it decides massive appeals that challenge administrative regulations, which protect public health, safety, and welfare and can be...

title: Biden tells Howard graduates hope is 'shadowed' by fear, hate but can still win
description: President Biden said hope is “shadowed” by fear, violence and hate but asserted that it can still win if people speak up to oppose those forces in his commencement address at Howard University on Saturday. Biden, the seventh sitting president to give the commencement address at the historically Black university, told graduates that he hoped...

title: Could the US and China become partners for peace in Ukraine?
description: If the two were to set aside their national egos and stop playing power politics, together they might be able to take a giant step toward saving tens of thousands of lives and preventing further destruction of Ukraine.

title: Mr. President: It’s time to create a ‘Single Mother’s Day’
description: I propose that President Joe Biden and Congress create a Single Mother's Day. At the very least, in the form of a proclamation.

title: Jordan Neely’s chokehold death on NYC subway: What has happened so far
description: The death of Jordan Neely, a 30-year-old homeless man with a history of mental illness, on a New York City subway earlier this month has sparked outcry and protests in the past couple weeks. title: Where do we draw the line on ethics in public office?
description: It has been a terrible, horrible, no good, very bad week for the Republican Party.

title: America's state media: The blackout on Biden corruption is truly 'Pulitzer-level stuff'
description: The coverage this week has all the markings of a state media. The consistent spin. The almost universal lack of details. The absurd distinctions.

title: How supporting a pardon helps the US uplift Africa’s largest democracy

title: GM recalls nearly 1 million vehicles due to risk of air bag inflators exploding
description: General Motors (GM) has recalled almost 1 million of its vehicles due to a risk of the driver's-side air bag inflators exploding during use.  Alex Ansley, the chief of the Recall Management Division in the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration, said in a letter to GM on Friday that it is acknowledging GM’s notification that...

title: Judge blocks Trump deposition in Strzok, Page lawsuit
description: A federal judge has blocked former President Trump from being questioned under oath as scheduled later this month in lawsuits brought by two former FBI staffers.  Former FBI agent Peter Strzok and former FBI attorney Lisa Page filed lawsuits after Strzok was fired and Page resigned from their positions in 2018 following the revelation of...

title: Debt ceiling: Biden faces legal risks, financial peril with 14th Amendment

title: How the GOP overcame infighting and passed its border bill
description: House Republicans fulfilled a major campaign promise this week with the passage of a border security crackdown measure — given the designation of H.R. 2 to symbolize its significance — that boosts border technology and funding, restarts border wall construction, adds new restrictions on asylum seekers and more. title: Trump-DeSantis rivalry ratchets up with dueling Iowa visits
description: Former President Donald Trump and Florida Gov. title: Former executive of TikTok parent company claims China 'maintained' access to US data
